## Data Collection Process

Collected 1000 responses from residents of Los Angeles Metropolitan Area. Data were collected using SurveyMonkey in May 2020, and respondents came from SurveyMonkey's proprietary panel. 

## Survey Contents

Questions were about the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on daily travel behavior, including: 

* Changes in working from home
* Changes in schooling from home
* Whether people moved and why they moved if so
* SES characteristics.
